check_input_shape(x) → None

Check if input image height and width are divisible by output_stride

Parameters:

x (torch.Tensor) – 4D torch tensor with shape (batch_size, channels, height, width)

Raises:

RuntimeError – if input image height or width are not divisible by output_stride

Returns:

None

Return type:

None

forward(x: Tensor) → Tensor

Sequentially pass x trough model`s encoder, decoder and heads.

model output

src.models.unet3plus module

Module containing UNet3Plus model definition.

class src.models.unet3plus.CenterBlock(in_channels: int, out_channels: int, use_batchnorm: bool = True)

Bases: Sequential

Center block. This block does not change the size of the signal, only the number of features is changed.

src.models.utils module

Utils for models.

src.models.utils.get_encoder(name: str, in_channels: int = 3, depth: int = 5, weights: str | None = None, output_stride: int = 32)

Loads encoder by name from timm library.

Parameters:

  • name – Name of the encoder.

  • in_channels – Number of input channels.

  • depth – Depth of the encoder.

  • weights – Pretrained weights.

  • output_stride – Output stride of the encoder.

Rtype name:

str

Rtype in_channels:

int

Rtype depth:

int

Rtype weights:

str

Rtype output_stride:

int

Returns:

Encoder.

Return type:

nn.Module
